questions.question: Which programming language is primarily used for developing Android apps?
Which type of memory is non-volatile and retains data even when power is turned off?
What is the function of a GPU in a computer system?
options: To process images and render graphics
To control input and output operations
questions.answer: To process images and render graphics

questions.question: Which company developed the Linux operating system?
options: None, it was created by Linus Torvalds
questions.answer: None, it was created by Linus Torvalds

questions.question: What is the name of the first web browser ever created?
Which of the following is a version control system used for tracking changes in code?
What does 'SSD' stand for in computer storage technology?
What does 'phishing' refer to in cybersecurity?
options: A type of social engineering attack used to steal sensitive data
A hacking technique to crash servers
A tool used to encrypt data
questions.answer: A type of social engineering attack used to steal sensitive data
